[bq="uc9"]So guess who isn't fired?! _+*ME! ME! ME!*+_
!http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lrfc2wVqg41qkcjl0.gif!


So why am I not fired?  My boss tried to have the other guy see if he could figure out how to do my job; the guy took one look athe programs and shit and went "I have no idea how to do any of this".

Sometimes being a nerd pays off cause sometimes if you have a shit paying job there's a overwhelming chance that nobody else will know how to do your job at all.[/bq]
1) Congration
2) [spoiler]_*+Screw you for reminding me of that video+*_[/spoiler]

topics.body:
I know I shouldn't really complain considering the series has been pretty excellent so far, but I can't help but get some homophobic vibes from Tokyo Ghoul.
[spoiler]The word "fag" has been used like six times now. And Shuu shows a lot of gay male stereotypes as well as being a complete sociopath. I get that cultural differences are a thing and it doesn't really bother me that much. It's just kind of OVERT.[/spoiler]
